ProductInfo.Features:
Windows 7 Professional 64-Bit; AMD Elite A6-5350M 2.9GHz up to 3.5GHz Turbo Core Accelerated Processor
15.6" diagonal LED-backlit HD anti-glare display (1366 x 768); 8GB DDR3L 1600MHz PC3-12800 RAM (2 Dimm)
250GB Solid State (SSD) Performance SATA III Hard Drive; AMD Radeon HD 8450G Graphics; DVD+/-RW
802.11b/g/n; Gigabit Ethernet; Webcam; 3 x USB 3.0; USB 2.0; 6-Cell 48 Wh Li-Ion Battery (Up to 6.2 hours)
Spill-Resistant Keyboard with Numeric Keypad; TrackPoint; Dolby Audio V2; HDMI; VGA; 1 Year Lenovo Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: Lenovo ThinkPad Edge E545 20B20011US AMD Elite 15.6" Windows 7 Professional Business Notebook PC (A6-5350M 2.9GHz, 250GB Performance SSD Hard Drive, Windows 7 PRO Laptop, 8GB RAM)
